file_content.text: Very good.
There is no emotion....
Forty-eight... forty-nine... fifty! Just fifty more to go, soldier!
Blast! Come on, how many hands is that?
He's just got that special something, Corso. Maybe you'll figure it out someday.
Blast... I'm just never going to win, am I?
Do they play sabacc differently in your hometown? Maybe the numbers on this deck go a little too high....
Hmph. Better ways to spend my time.
Since the game's winding down... think I could borrow you for a minute? I think someone's tampered with the navicomputer.
Tampered with it? How?
I couldn't begin to guess. Every time I put in a course, it re-plots it to a planet at the very edge of the Outer Rim: Rishi.
Rishi? The pirate hideout?
So I've heard. It's not that we couldn't make some credits in that type of setting, but I prefer to have a choice in the matter.
Can we fix the thing?
Already done. But someone wants us on that planet. Some kind of subtle job offer?
Or a trap.
Either way, sounds like more fun than another hand of sabacc. Let's find out what Rishi has in store.
Formation of scar tissue was accelerated successfully. However, increased dialymph levels can also be observed, increasing risk of parasitic infections such as brainworm rot.
Yuun. What's our computer status?
Most circuits guide their charges harmoniously. But our navigation system shows the marks of outside hands.
The location of a remote planet, Rishi, has been added to our astrogation charts. Tampering attempts to alter our destiny.
Squad! We've got a situation.
Yuun found evidence of tampering in our navigation system. Someone added a planet: Rishi. Anyone else notice anything odd?
Rishi? I keep getting messages from guys I've served with, all saying they're retiring there. Seemed like a few too many for coincidence... maybe more tampering?
My research logs consistently enter the word "Rishi" in place of other planet names when I'm making entries. I submitted a 592-K about it a week ago....
The review of such documents was to be the next step in today's journey.
Someone's trying to point us at Rishi. Opinions?
Then they went to a lot of trouble to get our attention. Someone must want us there pretty bad.
Bypassing all of our computer security protocols would require exceptional intelligence. Such a person couldn't have believed we wouldn't notice.
Let's find out who. Prep your gear--I'm setting course for Rishi.
There is peace....
Couldn't they practice with sticks or something? I'm not sure I'm equipped to reattach arms or legs or... heads.
The great Doc, not up to a real challenge? Thought your skills were second to none?
I never said I wasn't skilled, just that I'm not equipped. Uh... for that. Reattaching limbs.
It's a poor workman who blames his tools....
What's wrong? Are you all right?
Whoa... easy there. You're all right. What happened?
Master? Is something wrong?
I saw a planet. Far away, remote. And an island city.
Far-away planet = Rishi?
Rishi?
Coordinates for Rishi = entered into navicomputer // T7 = thought Master entered new destination
No... I didn't.
Wasn't me. I've never heard of the place.
A glitch? Sabotage?
Confirmation. We need to travel to Rishi, right away.
There is no ignorance....
There is knowledge....
Hey--sorry to intrude. But we have a situation.
That's all right, Felix. What's going on?
Master Jedi--apologies for the interruption. We have a situation.
What is it?
The navicomputer. Someone's tampered with it. Added a whole bunch of data about a planet called Rishi.
Nothing on Rishi but pirates and gunrunners. Slicing our computer would be out of their league.
Show me.
Are you okay? What happened?
Master? What is it?
A vision. This planet, Rishi... we must go there immediately.
Ah, Master Jedi. Greetings.
Good day, Master Jedi. I'm currently transmitting the navigational data that you requested.
Hey there, Major. Just forwarding those navigational coordinates you requested.
Ah, hello there. You're a hard one to find, Captain.
I apologize for the delayed response. I've just transferred the navigational data you requested to your ship's systems.
Navigational data? What are you talking about?
Coordinates and hyperroutes for the planet Rishi? In the Abrion sector, the Outer Rim?
I didn't make any such request.
I... uh... hm. I apologize for the error, Master Jedi. Sorry to have wasted your time. Good day.
What do you mean? I didn't request any navigational data.
You didn't? I have the order here... coordinates and hyperroutes for planet Rishi, Abrion sector, Outer Rim.
Your name and contact information are all clear as day... how strange.
I'll look into the matter and see that it doesn't happen again. Apologies for the mistake--have a nice day, Master Jedi.
I didn't request any navigational data. What are you talking about?
Are you sure... uh... sir? Planet Rishi, Abrion sector, Outer Rim?
Never heard of it.
It's your name and contact information here... that's just weird.
Sorry to have bothered you. Must have just been a computer glitch. Have a good one, Major.
Our office got that navigational data you requested. Forwarding now.
Navigational data? What are you talking about?
Planet Rishi? Abrion sector, Outer Rim? From the data we have, it's a popular spot for... independents, like you.
Popular or not, I never asked anyone for the address.
Weird. All of your details are right here... Sorry about the confusion. Have a good day, Captain.
Sounds like someone wants us on Rishi. Let's go.
Curious. Let's investigate.
That might not have been a glitch after all. Wouldn't hurt to check it out.
Hey, I just had a great idea. Let's go visit a popular spot for independents--like me.
